mission.description: User audit discovered critical gaps in wins/losses tracking and standards compliance
userQuestions: Do standards need to be updated?
Are there any unaddressed merges that need to be added to the handoff?
Did we log wins or losses and if not do the standards need to be updated and if so why weren't they automatically added to the handoff longterm log?
mission.criticalInsight: The central win loss is the community wisdom. I'm shocked you didn't see that

brilliantUserInsight.recognition: community-patterns.json IS the centralized wins/losses tracking system
brilliantUserInsight.overengineeringPrevented: Stopped AI from building redundant tracking system
brilliantUserInsight.elegantSolutionRevealed: Existing community patterns already provide complete tracking with context
